This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.146 by commit 710e3f526bd23a0d33435dedc52c3144de284378, it was introduced in version v5.10.140 by commit c907dfe4eaca9665694a0340de1458a093abe354. For more details please see the references link.
